items.sentence: Someone hacked into my account and changed the password.
You should've told Tom why it was a bad idea to do that.
The last thing I remember was hearing a sound behind me.
Time passes quickly when we're doing something we enjoy.
You're never safe from being surprised till you're dead.
I can't understand why Tom would do something like that.
Tom was able to answer every question that he was asked.
Tom was jealous when he saw Mary talking to another boy.
Tom was having a hard time swimming in the choppy water.
Tom was the first one to notice Mary sitting by herself.
